title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.19 - Purging
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.19 - Purging

State Regulations

The purging of water-seal gas holders, waterless gas
holders and pressure holders preparatory to extensive maintenance or
construction work on holders, valves and pipe connections, shall be done in
accordance with the latest procedure recommended by the American Gas

Association Committee and accepted by the American Gas Association. As of this
date the accepted procedure is dated March 15, 1933. This same procedure shall be followed before the holder
under repair is restored to service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
256.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
